mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.title, s.file_url, s.cover_url, s.genre, s.duration, s.lyrics, s.play_count, s.artist_id, a.name AS artistName, s.album_id AS albumId, alb.title AS albumTitle, alb.cover_url AS albumCover, ph.play_time FROM play_history ph LEFT JOIN music_song s ON ph.song_id = s.id LEFT JOIN music_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN music_album alb ON s.album_id = alb.id WHERE ph.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ph.play_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
